p: The specialization (H2′) of the recorded plant–bee networks also differed between plots and seasons (Table 4, Figures S1–S6). Native plants were part of more specialized networks than non‐native plants, and early season networks were more specialized than late season networks (Table 4). These trends also remained when removing honeybees ( A. mellifera) from networks (Table S4, also see 2.3 Statistics). Early season networks included fewer plant and bee species (Figures S1–S6).
